articles.description: Microsoft brings in its RiskIQ acquisition to launch Defender Threat Intelligence and Defender External Attack Surface Management.
articles.content:
Image: The Good Brigade / Getty
Microsoft has launched two security services that aim to boost the intelligence capabilities of an organization's security operations center (SOC) rather than solely … [+4120 chars]
